column4: i have a question? when i fetch all the cover art for my music, does it save the images in the same dir as the file?
will all the album art be available for other players? including those in windows?
ok. i don't know how that works...
how does rythmbox handle this issue?

well, first it checks the local music dir (the one the music file is in) for any png, jpg with the name "cover". If none, then it goes online and downloads a cover and stores it to ~/.gnome2/rhythmbox/covers and saves it as "<artist> - <album"
is there a way to save the files in the same dir as the song file?
in amarok, i beleive there was a plugin to do just that... let me see if i can find it...
you're not using amarok 2, are you?
thanx man, i'll try it out
thanx...it works well, the only thing is that it add the image once a song from the album has been played...
correct, the scrip runs only when a song from the album is played...
if you havne't played it yet, then you don't need the cover art... :P
